name: The Vintage and Handmade Bride Magazine - Issue 2
description:
The Vintage and Handmade Bride is Australia’s first wedding magazine dedicated entirely to those planning a vintage, handmade, eclectic or really personal wedding. Filled with pages of stunning styled shoot inspiration, crafty decorative ideas, helpful advice from wedding professionals and a lovely mix of real weddings it is an absolute must read!

Published twice a year (and quarterly from 2014!!), The Vintage and Handmade Bride and is a neat handbag size so that brides all over Australia can flick through the pages of unique and creative wedding ideas wherever they may be.

Issue 2 – September 2014

Our cover, shot by The Wanderers and The Wolves, features Ella Imms and is part of our unique wedding fashion piece featuring skirts for brides!  Hair and makeup is by The Beauty Case and Ella’s outfit is from Venice & Me including the gorgeous flower clip.

Also included in this issue is a fresh and colourful “Berry Brunch Elopement” inspiration shoot along with a DIY tutorial to make your own sewn paper garland that is featured in the shoot.  The fabulously talented and utterly lovely Gillian Bell Cake Girl also shares tips to make your very own layered crepe cake for a super cute cake alternative for the morning wedding.

We also got creative in the historic Tote Room at Eagle Farm Racecourse for a pretty mint and cream styled shoot.   It is such an amazing venue and we are really excited to be holding our next Brisbane wedding fair there in February 2014.

Of course we have our share of really gorgeous and really unique real weddings so you can all check out “how the other brides are doing it”.

Do yourselves a favour and grab a copy!!  Then be sure to drop us a line and let us know what you think, we love feedback from our readers so we can make each issue more and more awesome for you all.

*All orders shipped within 5 business days of receipt of order

name: The Vintage and Handmade Bride Magazine - Issue 1
description:
The Vintage and Handmade Bride Magazine

Issue 1


The Vintage and Handmade Bride is Australia’s first wedding magazine dedicated entirely to those planning a vintage, handmade, eclectic or really personal wedding. Filled with pages of stunning styled shoot inspiration, crafty decorative ideas, helpful advice from wedding professionals and a lovely mix of real weddings it is an absolute must read!

 
Published twice a year, The Vintage and Handmade Bride and is a neat handbag size so that brides all over Australia can flick through the pages of unique and creative wedding ideas wherever they may be.
 

Here are 3 awesome things about our brand new magazine:

1. It’s a clever handbag sized magazine that can easily slip into your lunch bag to take to work to flick through with your friends

2. Instead of really wordy stories about things that really don’t help couples planning a wedding we have plenty of real world advice directly from wedding professionals to share with you all

3. We put together our own styled shoots for our inspiration features and make a point to bring to you all something really different to have you all thinking outside the box about your wedding styling.


Ships worldwide.

*All orders shipped within 5 business days of receipt of order
